description: Amazon has confirmed that there will be a Prime Day in July. Here's everything you need to know to prepare for the massive shopping holiday.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2024: Amazon confirms the shopping holiday for July

description: The Huawei Pura 70 series, consisting of the Pura 70, 70 Pro and 70 Ultra,  are confirmed to be hitting the European market with May 2 preorder availability.
title: Huawei’s gorgeous Pura 70 phones just got expanded availability
